actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit against income tax for the recycling of hazardous wastes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax credit of $40 per ton of hazardous waste recycled by the taxpayer. Increases such credit to $60 per ton for hazardous waste generated in flood-prone areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit against income tax for the recycling of hazardous wastes.
